segments.text: I see a typical kitchen scene, though something is clearly amiss.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is running freely, pouring water into the basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's already overflowing, creating a continuous sheet down the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A large puddle is forming on the floor, spreading out from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman standing there is completely absorbed in drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm truly surprised she hasn't noticed the flood at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of her feet is actually submerged in the growing water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression remains perfectly neutral, focused solely on her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a pang of fear for the damage this water could cause.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets will be ruined, and the floorboards warped.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's unnerving how unaware she is of the immediate surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn her about the impending mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is spiraling out of control right under her nose.
segments.speaker: PAR
